lang.ErrorOnInteractive: The onstat interactive mode cannot be accessed through the OpenAdmin Tool.
lang.ErrorOnOnstat: Enter only the options. The command onstat is supplied by the OpenAdmin Tool.
lang.ErrorOnRepeat: The -r option is not allowed in onstat commands in the OpenAdmin Tool.
lang.ErrorOnOutput: The -o option is not allowed in onstat commands in the OpenAdmin Tool.
lang.ErrorOnInvalidChar: The onstat command contained an invalid character.
lang.ReportValidChars: Only alphanumeric characters, dashes, commas, and periods are allowed in onstat commands in the OpenAdmin Tool.
lang.OnstatFeatureNotAvail: The onstat utility feature is only available in the following server version (or higher): {0}
